meanings.definition: Made or caused by human beings rather than occurring naturally.
meanings.sent1: The manmade bridge connected the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent2: The manmade lake was created by building a dam.
meanings.sent3: The manmade forest looked so perfect, it almost seemed unreal.
meanings.sent4: The manmade island in the middle of the ocean was a marvel of engineering.
meanings.sent5: The manmade structure stood out against the natural landscape.

meanings.sent1: The manmade toy was carefully crafted by hand.
meanings.sent2: The manmade fabric was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The manmade snow in the ski resort made the slopes perfect for skiing.
meanings.sent4: The manmade light illuminated the dark room.
meanings.sent5: The manmade sound echoed through the empty hallways.
